snippet: Dr. Cahill clarified insulin’s role in metabolism by studying research subjects on starvation diets. He also testified for the prosecution at the trials of Claus von Bülow on charges of trying to murder his wife with insulin.
abstract: Dr George F Cahill Jr, diabetes expert who made pivotal discoveries about the role of insulin in metabolism, dies at age 85.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Cahill clarified insulin’s role in metabolism by studying research subjects on starvation diets. He also testified for the prosecution at the trials of Claus von Bülow on charges of trying to murder his wife with insulin.

headline.seo: George F. Cahill Jr., Diabetes Expert, Dies at 85
headline.main: George F. Cahill Jr., Diabetes Expert, Dies at 85
headline.print_headline: Dr. George F. Cahill Jr., Diabetes Expert, Is Dead at 85
